conclusion: Acceleration is +2 m/s² from 0 to 10 seconds.
Acceleration is 0 m/s² from 10 to 30 seconds.
Acceleration is -1 m/s² from 30 to 60 seconds.
The car starts moving from rest.
Integrate acceleration over each interval to obtain speed at interval boundaries.
Integrate speed-time data to obtain distance for each interval.
Sum the three interval distances to find total distance traveled.
